[quote=Какой-то ноунейм] Проснитесь и пойте, мистер Фримен… Проснитесь и пойте… Нет, я не хочу сказать, что вы спите на работе…Вас снова ждут великие дела...[/quote]
 [B] Итак, именно эта часть в серии второй Half-Life мне показалсь скучной в плане геймдизайна (Даже столько похвал не спасут игру многолетней выдержки и отговорки в плане ,,Ну она-же старая,чего прикопался?'') .
Да, некоторые треки мне понравились , некоторые из них просто замечательны и могут придать атмосферности , но поверьте если ее сравнивать с другими играми 2004 года выпуска, то да - игра замечательная в графике и во всем, т.к 3D графоний такого уровня никто и не ожидал (Потому компьютеры 2004 года терпели как могли,только чтобы потянуть это на минималках) . 
 Вообще такая яркая концепция мне не по душе,т.к сугрубо мое мнение . После просмотров пару десятков артов и различных демонстраций Бета версии ХЛ2 - она замечательная , та атмосфера и безысходность : высушеные океаны, воздуха нет,а в индустриальных секторах улицы покрыты едким (Но или нет) туманом .  
 Не зацепила,прямо как,спойлер и первый сезон . [/b]

Um dos melhores FPS de todos os tempos, sem dúvidas.
Half-Life é a Mecca do Counter-Strike, é o início de tudo.
Tem as campanhas mais criativas e sempre tendo aquele toque Puzzle, da Valve.
O jogo é muuuito antigo, mas os gráficos ainda agradam. Esse game estreou a Engine Source... mesma Engine usada nos games da Valve, até hoje. 
A história do jogo é muito interessante, te fazendo jogar mais e mais a procura de respostas. E nem sempre você tem um caminho certo pra ir. Muitas vezes o mapa se abrange e você tem a possibilidade de ir em vários lugares de um mesmo ambiente, isso faz até a gente se perder. 
Tirando o game em si, vem mais 2 expansões... O Episode 1 e 2, que equivalem a outros 2 títulos. Mas são a continuação da história.
Vale a pena, em promoções costuma ficar no preço de 2.99.
Jogasso!

The infamous Half-Life 2. What can I say that hasn’t been said already by the 42k+ reviews? It’s a great game that still holds up today. Do yourself a favor and don’t start with this game if you’re new to Half-Life. Go back and play the original, it’s worth it. 

I remember this game being a big deal back in 2004. The next-gen graphics…new physics engine. Can’t believe that was 14 years ago now. My first playthrough was on an Xbox 360. I had to play it on the platform is was made for…the PC.  

I played using the Half-Life 2 Update mod, with some improved visuals without touching the core gameplay elements. 

First and foremost, gameplay is fantastic and level design is great. The main mechanic, shooting & combat, feels natural and easy to control. It becomes second nature to switch through weapons to take out the various enemies most efficiently. While the levels are fairly linear, you are rewarded with ammo, health, etc. for exploring the levels rather than rush through them. There are a number of environments and places you will go in your travels and they all blend together nicely. Even with no objective markers or waypoints, you always know where you probably should be going with environmental queues. 

You are given different guns a good pace throughout the game. Once you get a handle on the pistol, for example, you are given the SMG and so on. There are 1 or 2 favorite weapons you’ll use but it’s beneficial to switch out weapons for the different enemy types. A headcrab doesn’t need a shotgun blast, but the magnum revolver takes out the Combine in 1 shot instead of ripping through a SMG clip. 

The physics are a big part of the game. It’s used everywhere. From solving puzzles to killing enemies, physics can be used to bring a new level of variety by using the environment and objects to your advantage. 

In 2018, the graphics are ok and do show some age up close. However, large open shots are very nice. The sound design is surprisingly solid. Audio clues are abundant to alert you of an enemy nearby. You’ll quickly lean which sounds mean which enemy. Controls are tight with the exception of platform jumping where precision is required. I would call it “unpredictable”. The inclusion of commanding a small squad is a neat idea and brings variety. However, the way it’s implemented isn’t good. You can command them to a certain point but they will go back to following you a few seconds later when you get too far away. It makes for frustrating enemy encounters where they get in your way more than help. 


[b]Pros[/b]
+60fps
+Great story
+Solid gameplay
+Tight controls
+Puzzles
+C’mon, it’s Half-Life 2

[b]Cons[/b]
+Unpredictable platforming (precise) jumps
+Wonky vehicle physics
+Squad support AI and commands implemented poorly

This is a game you need to play. Definitely considered a must own. 

A well-deserved score
[b]9/10[/b] Excellent

Never Forgive. Never Forget.

Rip Half Life

I have no nostalgia for this game, I feel this helps me see its actually problems. 

While this game was probably a genius work of code in its day and still feels great, it is lacking somethings that is not the fault of an older engine. 

This game does not show the character enough. I don't mean that games need to hold the player's hand the entire game, but the game should help the player see what they need to do. Looking for the way through breaks up the action and makes the game hard to continue. Not to say puzzle-like tasks should not be in a game like this, but the puzzles should be made in a way that you can tell from the start that the physics engine supports those puzzles. Progress through the level is another thing, sometimes you can't easily see where you need to go or what you need to do. This is bad desgin, surely anyone can see that the break in action caused by spending 10 mintues to find the exit is boring and uneeded.

This game made large leaps for gaming, but has frankly sometimes horrible level desgin.

唉，冲着情怀去玩的游戏，本以为2代能有更好一点的游戏体验，结果很快就卡关了。
应该是我本人太菜了吧，卡关原因是在某个储存点后生命值仅剩1，但后面的敌人和关卡难度还有机关不并是1点血就可以成功过关的。之前遇到过很多类似的问题，比如10点血或者最少的一次3点血，但都努力了很久过来了，但这个1点血实在是太极限了。
在奋力挣扎了2个小时后，也放弃了重新玩这个关卡的动力，终于选择了放弃跟卸载。
地图切换的速度真的很慢。。。。
游戏剧情什么的都很棒，只是卡关让我真的真的很难。

Игра офигеннная.
Когда Valve выпустила в 1998 HL1, мы увидили крутую 3d графику. Лучшую чем в 1-ой DOOM. А в 2004 не только графику подтянули, но и благодоря тогда иновационному движку Source продемонстрировали впечетляющие возможности физики. Сюжет хорош, персонажи раскрыты, у каждого противника своя тактика. Графика сейчас не так крута по сравнению с CoD:WWII или MGSV:TPP, но если хотоите улучшенную графика есть для этого любительски мод Cinematic mod(в Steam его нет ищите в браузере). Что на счёт локализации не знаю  что хуже, патч от Valve и локализация от студии Буки. Неважно. Советую всем поиграть.
P.S.: Гейб Ньюэлл, директор Valve, не выпустит Half-Life 2: episode 3 пока вы продолжайте пользоваться Steam, а также играйте в TF2, CS:GO, Dota 2 и Left 4 Dead, потому что пользуясь услугами Steam, вы даёте ему деньги и повод не разрабатывать новые игры

[b]Half-Life 2, secuela de uno de los videojuegos que han marcado un antes y un después dentro de esta indústria como es Half-Life, y precuela de Half... ejem... no, no hay una secuela de este HL2, y a este paso, nunca lo habrá.[/b]


[h1]HISTORIA[/h1]

Half-Life 2 se centra en nuestro protagonista del anterior juego, Gordon Freeman, esta vez deberemos liberar de la amenaza que asola Ciudad 17 de un ejército intergaláctico llamado la Alianza. Conoceremos personajes carismáticos como Alyx Vance, Eli Vance y compañia. Deberás atravesar cada rincón de esta ciudad y sus alrededores para conseguir tu propósito, salvar a la pobre gente de Ciudad 17, y con ello, salvar al mundo.

Al principio cogí este juego con muchas ganas, y acabé... ¡Con ganas de más!. Es un juego brillante en todo lo que hace, es el gran sucesor de uno de los videojuegos que cambiaron no solo el género shooter en primera persona, sino la indústria en general. Y a día de hoy, parece que no haya envejecido, es espectacular como luce, vamos, si os dijera que es del 2010, yo creo que mucha gente se lo creería, para que os hagáis una idea.


[h1]JUGABILIDAD Y CONTENIDO[/h1]

Yo personalmente prefiero jugar a los videojuegos en primera persona con ratón y teclado, hay gente que preferirá con mando, cada uno a su gusto, pero yo no tengo culpa de tener... ejem... buen gusto.

En cuanto dentro del juego, se nota que deriva de su antecesor, y es un juego "difícil", me explico. No es un juego en el que debas ir corriendo como un loco te plantas delante del enemigo y a disparar a mansalva. En ciertas ocasiones escasea la munición, en otras tantas no tendrás ni vida ni escudo, en otras habrá tantos enemigos que debas realizar el tiroteo de una manera pausada y tranquila acabando con tus enemigos uno a uno, ya que por poco que te disparen, si no llevas escudo, mueres en pocos disparos. Y hablando de disparos, en cuanto a  la sensación de estos, sin ningún problema, se siente genial.

Algo que me ha gustado mucho es que en cada conjunto de capitulos, tienes una mecánica nueva de la que disfrutar realizando los puzzles y superando los enfrentamientos contra la Alianza, y a su vez contra los enemigos típicos de Half-Life, los headcrabs, las lapas, los zombies...

Y por supuesto, este juego tiene una de las mejores armas jamás creada en los videojuegos y perfectamente acorde a la importancia que le da a las físicas la compañia Valve, como es la Gravity Gun, es muy divertida por el simple hecho de coger objetos del propio escenario y poder lanzarlos a los enemigos, desde bidones, sierras, cajas, extintores... todo tipo de objetos, en ocasiones que no tengas munición, puedes aprovechar las armas de las cuales dispones por los diversos escenarios.


[h1]CONCLUSIÓN[/h1]

Es un juego que se hace realmente disfrutable, tiene de todo, trama interesante, personajes carismáticos, puzzles bien pensados, sensación de disparo ideal en un FPS, mecánicas innovadoras, es un muy buen juego. ¡Recomendable al 100%!

[u]NOTA: 9,5/10[/u]

This game is an absolute must play. There's so much in this game, it brings a vast, incredible campaign with an enthralling story and several brilliant gameplay aspects. For a game made in 2004, it's stunning, some of the open world environments just made me full of awe, as well as the amazing dystopian atmospheres of City 17 and Ravenholm. Also there aren't any obnoxious characters you have to dread hearing. It'll take you a long time to complete HL2, but it sure is worth it ;)

Почему-то я не осилил пройти игру за 1 раз. (Купил в конце 2016, начал проходить в 2017, прошел 80% игры, в 2018 допрошел, хех) Если проходить игру на серьезных щях, то лучше не проходить ее на серьезных щях. Лучше врубите свою музыку и делайте шо хотите, игра не сильно сложная, так что можете поговорить со своими друзьями(если они, конечно, есть у вас :) ) За всю игру перестрелки с комбайнами надоели. Во всей игре мне запомнились 3 наиболее интересных момента, а именно: Город с зомби, катание на какой-то хуевине по болотам, и когда у нас забрали все оружие и заставили еб*шить всех усиленной грави-пушкой. И еще, эта игра помогла мне осознать, какое же я казульное говно, порой банально не мог найти куда идти.

Сюжет 7/10

Но в сюжете нихуя не понятно(возможно из-за того, что я не играл в хл1), он как бы "пустой", только в конце появился какой-то кек, остановил время нахаркал нам в лицо (или че он там сделал своим ртом) и свалил. Сюжета нет, ну может в эпизодах сюжет будет. Но все же, атмосферно.

This game is so good, the story is fantastic and gameplay is awesome. This is a straight 10/10 without a doubt.

Super game -- THE sci-fi shooter! I don't think there's any quite like it. It has tremendous replay value, and it was innovative when it came out, and even by today's standards 13 years later, it's still as fresh as ever.

Level design is incredibly diverse. The AI is so intricate and fun to observe. Sometimes enemies may surprise you with their logical behavior! 
It's a long linear game that retains a constant fun-factor throughout by keeping you on your toes through puzzles, hordes, vehicles, gadgets and more. In addition to all of this, the story is simple but effective, and the settings has the right amount of lore so as to maintain a willing suspension of disbelief without boring you with unnecessary "immersive" details. 

Physics and mechanics are also incredibly smooth -- smooth enough to go through the Zombie-infested Ravenwood level using nothing but the gravity gun :P

If you've already done Half-Life 2 there's still: the episodes (one and two), which are basically miniature epilogues for HL2; Garry's Mod mods; Half-Life (or Black Mesa, which is basically Half-Life redone to feel more like HL2) and the midquels (like Blue Shift); and, of course, the two Portal games.
When it comes to older games that have a similar feel, I would also recommend the original Far Cry (if you're looking for another shooter) and the original Deus Ex with the Revision mod (if you don't mind stealth-shooters and you're looking for another excellent sci-fi game).

For the first time playing through the half life series, I thought this game was just the perfect sequal. The storyline takes the game into a new direction, immersing the player even more than the first half life. Graphics were better than ever and even still hold up today. Shooting feels better and more stable than the first game too, and unlike the first game where walking can feel slippery, half life 2 fixed that. Overall, this game was pretty good for its time, and it still holds up today as a classic to all pc gamers alike.

很好很强大.打折买的  玩的比较爽的单机  也不废配置   有的地方需要动脑才可以

This game is broken now.. It was a great game once
Total loss due to lack of support, if it ever gets fixed it might be a great game once more.
But they dont care about it anymore.. and dont seem to care that people cant play it

[h1]神作[/h1]

1. 惊艳的画面，即使放在今天看也可圈可点。
2. 出色的关卡设计，有时需要开开脑洞。[spoiler]总想着往高处跳是怎么回事[/spoiler]
3. 优秀的中文配音！我天，从未见过如此高质量的中文配音，业界良心啊！！

[strike]不过起源引擎真的很强大，我玩其他的游戏都不晕，唯独HL2晕得不行，每次只能坚持一个小时，看来这辈子是通不了关了。/笑[/strike]
